overview: The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is a pet summoning item which summons a pet Baby Grinch that follows the player around. Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle has a 1/15 (6.67%) chance of being dropped by Ice Queen during the later waves of the Frost Moon event.
title: Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle

grant.tooltip: A baby grinch is following you
